oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Centre Wales Factsheet 13: Organic milk production: financial performance
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Anon,
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education, extension and communication
Markets and trade
Dairy cattle
Farm economics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This factsheet discusses the financial performance of organic milk production. Market prospects are discussed along with financial data comparing conventional and organic dairy herds for 2003/04 and 2004/05.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Anon, (2006) Organic Centre Wales Factsheet 13: Organic milk production: financial performance. Organic Centre Wales.
